start: ^The castle <color=#F8FF30>was under attack</color>, and soon darkness would engulf the entire kingdom. A call for help had been sent.
^Our prince wants to help; he has gathered a troop. On the way, they were attacked, and our hero was left alone. Will he have to deal with this all by himself?!
^They say, “Even one person has the power to change the course of time”. Well, it's time to find out the truth.
